content: materials our confetti blanket bundle 1 includes 9 skeins of purl soho s pepper 2 100% superwash merino wool yarn each skein of this sport- to light worsted/dk-weight yarn is 218 yards/ 100 grams - main color mc 4 skeins approximately 870 total yards required we used berry icy - contrast color 1 cc1 3 skeins approximately 575 total yards required we used purple onion - contrast color 2 cc2 2 skeins approximately 295 total yards required we used spring daffodil you will also need us 11 8 mm 32-inch circular needles 3 gauge 14 stitches and 24 row = 4 inches in seed stitch holding yarn double size finished dimensions 30 inches wide x 40 inches long designed by purl soho designer gianna mueller 4 see more of gianna s designs on her instagram 5 1 https //www purlsoho com/confetti-blanket-bundle html 2 https //www purlsoho com/pepper html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/ 5 https //www instagram com/giannaknits/
